result.markdown:
---
title: "可视化"
---




## 森林图




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(meta)
m.gen <- metagen(TE = TE,
                 seTE = seTE,
                 studlab = Author,
                 data = dmetar::ThirdWave,
                 sm = "SMD",
                 fixed = FALSE,
                 random = TRUE,
                 method.tau = "REML",
                 method.random.ci = "HK",
                 prediction = TRUE,
                 title = "Third Wave Psychotherapies")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
meta::forest(m.gen, 
             sortvar = TE,
             prediction = TRUE, 
             print.tau2 = FALSE,
             leftlabs = c("Author", "g", "SE"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](forest_plots_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
meta::forest(m.gen, 
             sortvar = TE,
             prediction = TRUE, 
             print.tau2 = FALSE,
             leftcols = c("studlab", "TE", "seTE", "RiskOfBias"),
             leftlabs = c("Author", "g", "SE", "Risk of Bias"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](forest_plots_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
meta::forest(m.gen, layout = "JAMA")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](forest_plots_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
meta::forest(m.gen, layout = "RevMan5")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](forest_plots_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pdf(file = "images/forestplot.pdf", width = 8, height = 7)

meta::forest(m.gen, 
             sortvar = TE,
             prediction = TRUE, 
             print.tau2 = FALSE,
             leftlabs = c("Author", "g", "SE"))

dev.off()
#> png 
#>   2
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
svg(file = "images/forestplot.svg", width = 8, height = 7)

meta::forest(m.gen, 
             sortvar = TE,
             prediction = TRUE, 
             print.tau2 = FALSE,
             leftlabs = c("Author", "g", "SE"))

dev.off()
#> png 
#>   2
```
:::




## Drapery Plots




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
drapery(m.gen, 
        labels = "studlab",
        type = "pval", 
        legend = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](forest_plots_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
